clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of Oral and Intravenous (IV) Tedizolid Phosphate in Hospitalized Participants, Ages 2 to <12 Years, With Confirmed or Suspected Bacterial Infection (MK-1986-013)
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Single-Administration Pharmacokinetic and Safety Study of Oral and IV Tedizolid Phosphate in Hospitalized Subjects 2 to <12 Years Old

brief_summary.textblock: This is a study to assess the pharmacokinetics (PK) of tedizolid phosphate and its active metabolite, tedizolid, and the safety of tedizolid phosphate following administration of a single IV (Part A) or oral suspension (Part B) administration to hospitalized participants ages 6 to <12 years (Groups 1 and 3, respectively), and 2 to <6 years (Groups 2 and 4, respectively).

detailed_description.textblock:
Part A (IV):
- Group 1 (Cohort 1 and Cohort 2) (6 to <12 years)
- Group 2 (Cohort 1 and Cohort 2) (2 to <6 years)
Part B (Oral Suspension):
- Group 3 (6 to <12 years)
- Group 4 (2 to <6 years)
In Cohort 1 of Group 1 (IV) participants received a single administration of tedizolid phosphate at 5 mg/kg of total body weight. After all participants in Cohort 1 of Group 1 received study drug, a preliminary analysis of the safety and PK data was performed and results were used to select 4 mg/kg as the appropriate dose for Cohort 2 of Group 1 and Group 3, and to select 6 mg/kg as the starting dose for the younger participants, Cohort 1 of Group 2. After all participants in Cohort 1 of Group 2 receive study drug, another preliminary analysis of the safety and PK data will be performed and results will be used to confirm 6 mg/kg as the appropriate dose for Cohort 2 of Group 2. Similarly, the Group 4 dose will be confirmed after data review of Group 3 results.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum observed drug concentration in plasma (Cmax) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: Cmax of IV tedizolid phosphate (TZD) and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.measure: Time to reach peak plasma concentration (tmax) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: Tmax of IV TZD and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.measure: Area under the plasma concentration-time curve (AUC) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: AUC of IV TZD and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.measure: Terminal elimination half-life (t1/2) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: T1/2 of IV TZD and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.measure: Clearance after oral administration (CL/F) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: CL/F of oral suspension TZD and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.measure: Clearance after IV administration (CL) of tedizolid phosphate
primary_outcome.time_frame: Part A: immediately after the end of the 1 hour infusion, and at 1.5, 2, 3, 4, 6, 12, and 24 hours after the start of infusion
primary_outcome.description: CL of IV TZD and its active metabolite, tedizolid, in participants ages 6 to <12 years (Group 1) and 2 to <6 years (Group 2).

primary_outcome.time_frame: Part B (2 to <6 years): 3, 6, 9, 12, 24, and 48 hours after study drug administration; Part B (6 to <12 years): 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, and 24 hours after study drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Bioavailability will be determined by comparing the area under the concentration time curve (AUC) of an oral dose vs. IV dose of tedizolid phosphate.

arm_group.description: Single IV infusion of tedizolid phosphate administered to participants 6 to <12 years of age. Cohort 1 will receive 5 mg/kg of total body weight. Cohort 2 will receive 4 mg/kg of total body weight.

Single IV infusion of tedizolid phosphate administered to participants 2 to <6 years of age. Cohort 1 and Cohort 2 will receive 6 mg/kg of total body weight with a potential adjustment up to a maximum dose of 200 mg of tedizolid phosphate.

Single dose of tedizolid phosphate administered as an oral suspension at 4 mg/kg of total body weight to participants 6 to <12 years of age. Administration of tedizolid phosphate as an oral suspension is to occur within 15-60 minutes following a meal.

Single dose of tedizolid phosphate administered as an oral suspension at 6 mg/kg of total body weight with a potential adjustment up to a maximum dose of 200 mg of tedizolid phosphate to participants 2 to <6 years of age. Administration of tedizolid phosphate as an oral suspension is to occur within 15-60 minutes following a meal.
